text: Ian gumazir dapaniba ian akurvasa egha zurara ian gari. Egh me gɨn ingangarir me amizibar gun God ko mɨkɨmam. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia men akaba baragh egh men apengan ikɨ. Egh ia kamaghɨn damutɨ, eghtɨ me bar akuegh uan ingangarim damuam. Ia kamaghɨn damuan koghtɨ, me osɨmtɨzim sara ian ganam, eghtɨ bizir kam ian akuraghan kogham.
